<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-------- LoopIdiomVectorize.cpp - Loop idiom vectorization -----------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass implements a pass that recognizes certain loop idioms and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transforms them into more optimized versions of the same loop. In cases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where this happens, it can be a significant performance win.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We currently only recognize one loop that finds the first mismatched byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in an array and returns the index, i.e. something like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  while (++i != n) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    if (a&#91;i&#93; != b&#91;i&#93;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this example we can actually vectorize the loop despite the early exit,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// although the loop vectorizer does not support it. It requires some extra</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// checks to deal with the possibility of faulting loads when crossing page</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// boundaries. However, even with these checks it is still profitable to do the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: This Pass matches a really specific loop pattern because it&#39;s only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// supposed to be a temporary solution until our LoopVectorizer is powerful</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// enought to vectorize it automatically.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO List:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Add support for the inverse case where we scan for a matching element.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Permit 64-bit induction variable types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Recognize loops that increment the IV &#42;after&#42; comparing bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; Allow 32-bit sign-extends of the IV used by the GEP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We only ever expect the pre-incremented index value to be used inside the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure that when the Found and End blocks are identical the PHIs have the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// supported format. We don&#39;t currently allow cases like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// while.cond:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br i1 %cmp.not, label %while.end, label %while.body</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// while.body:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br i1 %cmp.not2, label %while.cond, label %while.end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// while.end:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %final&#95;ptr = phi ptr &#91; %c, %while.body &#93;, &#91; %d, %while.cond &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Where the incoming values for %final&#95;ptr are unique and from each of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop blocks, but not actually defined in the loop. This requires extra</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// work setting up the byte.compare block, i.e. by introducing a select to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// choose the correct value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: We could add support for this in future.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FoundBB == EndBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;EndPN : EndBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a13da92d2694197fbcb5b95fd94e7570d">phis</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;WhileCondVal = EndPN.getIncomingValueForBlock(Header);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;WhileBodyVal = EndPN.getIncomingValueForBlock(WhileBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The value of the index when leaving the while.cond block is always the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same as the end value (MaxLen) so we permit either. The value when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// leaving the while.body block should only be the index. Otherwise for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any other values we only allow ones that are same for both blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WhileCondVal != WhileBodyVal &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ((WhileCondVal != Index &amp;&amp; WhileCondVal != MaxLen) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">           (WhileBodyVal != Index)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;FOUND IDIOM IN LOOP: \\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; &#42;(EndBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>()) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The index is incremented before the GEP/Load pair so we need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add 1 to the start value.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       FoundBB, EndBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EndBlock = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac6c9ffe7979754415f4ca0d677174bc2">SplitBlock</a>(Preheader, PHBranch, DT, LI, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;mismatch&#95;end&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the blocks that we&#39;re going to need:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1 A block for checking the zero-extended length exceeds 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  2 A block to check that the start and end addresses of a given array</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     lie on the same page.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  3 The vector loop preheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  4 The first vector loop block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  5 The vector loop increment block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  6 A block we can jump to from the vector loop when a mismatch is found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  7 The first block of the scalar loop itself, containing PHIs , loads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  and cmp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  8 A scalar loop increment block to increment the PHIs and go back</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  around the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the zero-extended iteration count &gt; 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(MinItCheckBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ExtStart = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9e6950f7f17700d5c0d61ad0b846ec5c">CreateZExt</a>(Start, I64Type);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ExtEnd = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9e6950f7f17700d5c0d61ad0b846ec5c">CreateZExt</a>(MaxLen, I64Type);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This check doesn&#39;t really cost us very much.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LimitCheck = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#adee01f42d94cdb8f7430098e5c64aaad">CreateICmpULE</a>(Start, MaxLen);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;MinItCheckBr =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a9f40e42226cee617c16cb1c447b115c5">BranchInst::Create</a>(MemCheckBlock, LoopPreHeaderBlock, LimitCheck);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MinItCheckBr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a9247a212ea89acc9573fa7e7f557eaba">setMetadata</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a8ef25defccf4817608a13e7a9db4000d">Insert</a>(MinItCheckBr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DTU.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a363d442ff7f9a13eafaee275aad9f54c">applyUpdates</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#123;&#123;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a9aeeca2833810f01b20545a46fe22503">DominatorTree::Insert</a>, MinItCheckBlock, MemCheckBlock&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">       &#123;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a9aeeca2833810f01b20545a46fe22503">DominatorTree::Insert</a>, MinItCheckBlock, LoopPreHeaderBlock&#125;&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each of the arrays, check the start/end addresses are on the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// page.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(MemCheckBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The early exit in the original loop means that when performing vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loads we are potentially reading ahead of the early exit. So we could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fault if crossing a page boundary. Therefore, we create runtime memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// checks based on the minimum page size as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 Calculate the addresses of the first memory accesses in the loop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      i.e. LhsStart and RhsStart.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2 Get the last accessed addresses in the loop, i.e. LhsEnd and RhsEnd.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   3 Determine which pages correspond to all the memory accesses, i.e</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      LhsStartPage, LhsEndPage, RhsStartPage, RhsEndPage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   4 If LhsStartPage == LhsEndPage and RhsStartPage == RhsEndPage, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      we know we won&#39;t cross any page boundaries in the loop so we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      enter the vector loop! Otherwise we fall back on the scalar loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LhsStartGEP = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a73e0482b96d9d0cdfcc90c0a34f5b0db">CreateGEP</a>(LoadType, PtrA, ExtStart);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;RhsStartGEP = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a73e0482b96d9d0cdfcc90c0a34f5b0db">CreateGEP</a>(LoadType, PtrB, ExtStart);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;RhsStart = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aae2c1bf70058f3665edaec525457030c">CreatePtrToInt</a>(RhsStartGEP, I64Type);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LhsStart = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aae2c1bf70058f3665edaec525457030c">CreatePtrToInt</a>(LhsStartGEP, I64Type);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the end block we need to insert a PHI node to deal with three cases:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1 We didn&#39;t find a mismatch in the scalar loop, so we return MaxLen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  2 We exitted the scalar loop early due to a mismatch and need to return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  the index that we found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  3 We didn&#39;t find a mismatch in the vector loop, so we return MaxLen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  4 We exitted the vector loop early due to a mismatch and need to return</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure all Phis in the successors of CmpBB have an incoming value from it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">  fixSuccessorPhis(EndBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EndBB != FoundBB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">    fixSuccessorPhis(FoundBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new CmpBB block isn&#39;t part of the loop, but will need to be added to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the outer loop if there is one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CurLoop-&gt;isOutermost())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurLoop-&gt;getParentLoop()-&gt;addBasicBlockToLoop(CmpBB, &#42;LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a0d8e4205a366d4dc7847aa4f8677b79f">VerifyLoops</a> &amp;&amp; CurLoop-&gt;getParentLoop()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurLoop-&gt;getParentLoop()-&gt;verifyLoop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CurLoop-&gt;getParentLoop()-&gt;isRecursivelyLCSSAForm(&#42;DT, &#42;LI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7f2a3d4dcfee70225988aec53ff1e173">report&#95;fatal&#95;error</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Loops must remain in LCSSA form!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
